Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %

Dewpoint: -5.5°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this evening and ending later this evening. Clearing this evening. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
